page.title: 11Sports in Tiverton
page.content: In Tiverton there are quite a few sporting facilities: Eight Public Tennis Courts (+ 3 at School). Swimming Pool. Rugby pitches and recreation grounds. The local Rugby team is quite good and plays teams from all over the South West. There are two main Soccer teams: Tiverton Town and Elmore, but there are lots of local league sides as well. Football is a very popular sport. So is cricket in the summer. A lot of people go angling on the Canal nearby. Others play squash at Blundell's School. The Tiverton Harriers are the local athletics team. There is even a Rifle Club in the town. Our only famous local sportsmen are Vic Marks who plays cricket for Somerset and England and Chris Maddocks a long distance walker who was in the Los Angeles Olympics.
